root.name: Dracula Love Kills
root.description: OverviewIn Dracula Love Kills, the blood-sucking count awakes only to find that the Queen of Vampires has abducted Mina Harker, his mortal love interest. Dracula, his minion Igor and the unlikely supporter Van Helsing join forces and track down the Queen to try and rescue Mina. The game is a hidden-object / puzzle hybrid. The player either has to use objects to interact with the environment (use knife to open sea shell etc.) or find specific objects in a cluttered environment. The game is high-resolution graphics, albeit semi-static screen with only limited animations. There are two difficulty modes available, easy and hard, varying in number of available hints etc.
